scripts.build: npm run build:editor && npm run build:engine
scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && npm run build:editor && npm run build:engine && ./deploy.sh
scripts.build:engine: cross-env PAGE=ENGINE vue-cli-service build --target lib --name engine ./src/engine-entry.js
scripts.build:core_editor: cross-env PAGE=CORE_EDITOR vue-cli-service build --target lib --name core-editor ./src/components/core/index.js
